//table-pagination
var calculateRange=function calculateRange(data,rowsPerPage){var range=[];var num=Math.ceil(data.length/rowsPerPage);for(var i=1;i<=num;i++){range.push(i);}return range;};var sliceData=function sliceData(data,page,rowsPerPage){return data.slice((page-1)*rowsPerPage,page*rowsPerPage);};export{calculateRange,sliceData};
